name: BfROpenLab
body:
### What is BfROpenLab?
BfROpenLab is a collection of several extensions for the data analytics software KNIME (http://www.knime.org/) developed at the Federal Institute for Risk Assessment in Germany (BfR). It contains the following extensions:

* KNIME Foodchain Tracing Nodes
* KNIME GIS Nodes
* KNIME NLS Nodes
* SBML

### How to install it?
Download KNIME from http://www.knime.org/ and install it. Extensions to KNIME can be installed via _Help -> Install New Software_ in the Main Window.

![](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLab/raw/master/GitHubPages/images/1.png)

Press _Add_ to add BfROpenLab repository: http://dl.bintray.com/silebat/generic/

![](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLab/raw/master/GitHubPages/images/2.png)

Select the extensions you would like to install, press _Next_ and follow the menu prompts.

![](https://github.com/SiLeBAT/BfROpenLab/raw/master/GitHubPages/images/3.png)
